TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Legend extends System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartNamedElement

summary.span: 表示图表图像的图例。

span.span: Represents the legend for the chart image.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类封装的所有功能控件的图例，并使用公开集合的根属性对象。The class encapsulates all the functionality of the control's legend, and is exposed using the collection property of the root object. 可以有任意数量的图表图像的图例。There can be any number of legends for a chart image. 图例可以：Legends can: - 停靠和对齐。Be docked and aligned. - 显示内部或外部绘制的图表区。Be displayed inside or outside the plotted chart areas. - 自动适应其内容。Automatically fit their contents. - 使用预定义的样式，如行、 列或表。Use a predefined style, such as row, column or table. - 使用阴影、 渐变颜色和背景图像。Use hatching, gradient colors and background images. - 可调整大小和在图表图像中任意位置放置。Be sized and positioned anywhere within the chart image. 图例项都由对象，并且是默认或自定义项。Legend items are represented by the object, and are either default or custom items. 自定义项不相关联的数据，并可以添加、 删除和修改使用属性。Custom items are not associated with data, and can be added, deleted and modified using the property. 默认项是默认情况下都将自动添加到图例中，并且圆环图和饼形图的绘制的数据点的名称。Default items are by default automatically added to the legend, and are the names of the plotted data points for doughnut and pie charts. 对于所有其他图表类型，默认的项目是绘制的数据序列的名称。For all other chart types, the default items are the names of the plotted data series. 每个系列具有定义将使用将图例的名称的属性。Each series has a property that defines the name of the legend that will be used. 图例项将不会创建一系列如果属性设置为`false`。A legend item will not be created for a series if the property is set to `false`. 可以使用更改这些默认的项目的文本属性。The text for these default items can be changed using the property. 此属性将允许你指定将替换为相应的值在运行时的预定义的关键字。This property will allow you to specify predefined keywords that will be replaced by their appropriate values at run-time. 如果你有一个饼图，并设置属性，它还将设置图例文本设置标签的值。If you have a pie chart and you set the property, it will also set the legend text to the value you set for the labels. 如果你想要为不同的值设置的文本，则可以设置属性。If you want to set the text to a different value, you can set the property. 在大多数情况下，你将想要设置属性设置为"#AXISLABEL"或"#VALX"。In most cases, you would want to set the property to "#AXISLABEL" or "#VALX". 图例系列符号是矩形、 点或线条。Legend series symbols are rectangles, dots or lines. 符号类型由图表自动设置，并且依赖于绘制的图表类型。The symbol type is set automatically by the chart and depends on the plotted chart type. 默认情况下的图例文本自动调整大小。Legend text by default is automatically sized. 你可以通过禁用禁用的图例文本自动调整大小属性。You can disable automatic sizing of legend text by disabling the property. 当此属性设置为`false`，图例文本的大小由图例的大小属性。When this property is set to `false`, the size of the legend text is determined by the Size property of the legend . 如果属性已启用，属性确定一个图例项可以有在调整大小时的最小字号。If the property is enabled, the property determines the minimum font size that a legend item can have when resizing. 属性定义的文本换行到另一行之前可以在一行显示的字符数限制。The property defines a limit on the number of characters that can be shown on one line before text is wrapped to another line. 如果你不希望在图例中的文本换行，将的值设置为零的属性。If you do not wish to wrap text in the legend, set the value of the property to zero. 默认情况下，当整个图例文本无法容纳在图例中，文本将被截断。By default, when the entire legend text does not fit in the legend, the text will be truncated. 你可以设置图例以获取文本换行而不被截断。You can set the on the legend to get the text to wrap instead of being truncated. 如果将图例的内容无法放入给定区域，图例项将被截断。If the contents of the legend cannot fit into the given space, legend entries are truncated. 省略号显示以指示不存在多个项与图例拥有的空间。An ellipsis is shown to indicate that there are more entries than the legend has space for. 若要防止图例项被截断，设置的位置和大小的图例使用属性。To prevent the legend items from being truncated, set the position and size of the legend using the property. 设置图例位置或大小时, 图表可以不再自动放置在图表中的元素。When setting the legend position or size, the chart can no longer automatically position the elements in the chart. 在某些情况下，许多需要手动定位其他图表元素，以获得所需的外观。In some cases, you many need to manually position other chart elements to achieve the desired appearance. 另一种方法是定义而不是使用默认图例设置自己的单元格的列。Another option would be to define your own cell columns instead of using the default legend settings. 对象都有一个 CellColumn 集合; 每个 CellColumn 对象表示在图例中的列。The object has a CellColumn Collection; each CellColumn object represents a column in the Legend. 某一单元格列具有和属性，可以用于调整列的大小。A cell column has and properties that can be used to adjust the size of the columns. 如果图例中包含许多项，可以用于提高可读性。When the legend contains many entries, can be used to improve readability. 如果此属性设置为 True 时，它将显示你可以使用设置的背景色属性。When this property is set to True, it will display a back color that you can set using the property. 默认情况下，图例位于图表右上角。By default, the legend is positioned in the top-right corner of the chart. 可以通过修改此位置和将图例的属性。This position can be modified by using the and properties of the legend. 图例还可以通过使用与图表区相关联属性。The legend can also be associated with a chart area by use of the property. 此属性指定应为其停靠图例的图表区的名称。This property specifies the name of the chart area for which the legend should be docked. 此外，属性可以用于显示在图表区的图例。In addition, the property can be used to display the legend inside a chart area. 当设置为 False，属性定义的最大大小，以百分比表示，可用图表时自动定位图例中图例。When is set to False, the property defines the maximum size, in percent, of the legend within the available chart when the legend is automatically positioned. 如果你想要调整的宽度或高度的图例已设置的停靠属性后，应设置此属性。This property should be set if you wish to adjust the width or height of the legend after the docking properties have been set. 可以使用修改图例事件。The legend can be modified using the event.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified legend name.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::StringAlignment Alignment { System::Drawing::StringAlignment get(); void set(System::Drawing::StringAlignment value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置图例的对齐方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the alignment of the legend.

value.span: 一个 .NET Framework 枚举值，该值表示图例的对齐方式。

span.span: A .NET Framework enumeration value that represents the alignment of the legend.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以便它可以对齐图例，或; 也会影响它的对齐属性设置。The legend can be aligned so that it is , or ; its alignment is also affected by the property setting. 如果在图例停靠到顶部或底部，停靠到左侧或右侧，则将左侧;正处于顶部。If the legend is docked to the top or bottom, is to the left; if it is docked to the left or right, is at the top. 属性设置为正相反，和将对齐到右侧或底部，具体取决于停靠的位置的图例。The property setting is just the opposite, and aligns the legend to the right or the bottom, depending on where it is docked. 始终中心图例中，垂直或水平。 always centers the legend, either vertically or horizontally. 设置属性将产生任何影响，如果属性未设置为。Setting the property will have no effect if the property is not set to .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int AutoFitMinFontSize { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置可用于图例文本自动调整算法的最小字号。

span.span: Gets or sets the minimum font size that can be used by the autofitting algorithm for the legend text.

value.span: 一个 值，表示可用于图例文本自动调整算法的最小字号。

span.span: An value that represents the minimum font size that can be used by the autofitting algorithm for the legend text.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Color BackColor { System::Drawing::Color get(); void set(System::Drawing::Color value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Windows.Forms.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartColorEditor, System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 获取或设置图例的背景色。

span.span: Gets or sets the background color of a legend.

value.span: 一个 值，该值用于绘制图例的背景色。

span.span: A value used to draw the background color of a legend.

value.span: 默认颜色为 。

span.span: The default color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以将此属性设置为任何有效的 ARGB alpha、 红色、 绿色 (蓝色） 值。You can set this property to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. 值将为第一种颜色使用如果已指定背景的渐变颜色。The value will be the first color used if you have specified gradient colors for the background. Alpha 值控制一种颜色的不的透明度。The alpha value controls the opacity of a color. 如果将此颜色设置为"透明"— 也就是说，如果你使用的 alpha 值为 0-无颜色将分配给将图例的背景。If you set this color to "transparent"—that is, if you use an alpha value of 0—no color will be assigned to the background of the legend. 因此，背景将呈透明。As a result, the background will be transparent.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::GradientStyle BackGradientStyle { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::GradientStyle get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::GradientStyle value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Windows.Forms.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientEditor, System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 获取或设置图例的背景渐变方向。

span.span: Gets or sets the orientation for the background gradient of a legend.

summary.span: 还确定是否使用渐变。

span.span: Also determines whether a gradient is used.

value.span: 一个 枚举，指示图例的背景渐变的方向。

span.span: A enumeration that specifies the orientation for the background gradient of a legend.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来确定是否图例将显示渐变，并以确定渐变的方向，如果一个使用。Use the property to determine whether a legend will display a gradient, and to determine the orientation of the gradient if one is used. 有关可用模式的列表，请参阅枚举。For a listing of available patterns, refer to the enumeration. 若要使用渐变颜色：To use gradient colors: 设置主要颜色的图例背景属性。Set the primary color of the legend background with the property. 设置图例背景辅助颜色属性。Set the secondary color of the legend background with the property. 将此项设置为所需的渐变样式的属性。Set this property to the desired gradient style.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartHatchStyle BackHatchStyle { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartHatchStyle get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartHatchStyle value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Windows.Forms.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.HatchStyleEditor, System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 获取或设置图例的阴影类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the hatching style of a legend.

value.span: 一个 枚举，指定图例的阴影样式。

span.span: A enumeration that specifies the hatching style of a legend.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 枚举指定使用类型的画笔的阴影模式。The enumeration specifies the hatch pattern used by a brush of type . 阴影图案由纯色背景色和背景上绘制的直线组成。The hatch pattern consists of a solid background color and lines drawn over the background. 有关可用的阴影样式的列表，请参阅枚举。For a listing of available hatching styles, refer to the enumeration. **请注意**阴影行的颜色由属性。**Note** The color of hatching lines is determined by the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ BackImage { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Windows.Forms.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.ImageValueEditor, System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 获取或设置图例的背景图像。

span.span: Gets or sets the background image of a legend.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示图像文件的 URL。

span.span: A value that represents the URL of an image file.

value.span: 默认值为一个空字符串。

span.span: The default value is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性定义的背景图像路径图例中，可以是绝对或相对 URL。This property defines a path to a background image for a legend, and can be an absolute or relative URL. 若要定位图像，请使用和属性。To position the image, use the and properties. 你还可以指定通过设置为"透明"的映像显示的颜色之一属性。You can also specify one of the colors displayed by the image as "transparent", by setting the property. 映像可以来源于支持.NET Framework，包括图标的任何有效图形文件。An image can originate from any valid graphics file supported by .NET Framework, including icons. 背景图像优先于其他后台属性，如渐变颜色。Background images take precedence over other background properties such as gradient color.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartImageAlignmentStyle BackImageAlignment { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartImageAlignmentStyle get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartImageAlignmentStyle value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置用于 绘制模式的背景图像对齐方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the background image alignment used for the drawing mode.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，指定背景图像对齐方式。

span.span: A enumeration value that specifies the background image alignment.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性确定图例; 的背景图像的对齐方式它是仅应用的在属性设置为。This property determines the alignment of the background image for the legend; it is only applied when the property is set to .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Color BackImageTransparentColor { System::Drawing::Color get(); void set(System::Drawing::Color value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置在绘制背景图像时，将替换为透明色的颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets a color that will be replaced with a transparent color when the background image is drawn.

value.span: 一个 值，表示绘制背景图像时，它将显示为透明色。

span.span: A value that will be displayed as transparent color when the background image is drawn.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartImageWrapMode BackImageWrapMode { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartImageWrapMode get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartImageWrapMode value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置图例背景图像的绘制模式。

span.span: Gets or sets the legend background image drawing mode.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，指定图例背景图像的绘制模式。

span.span: A enumeration value that specifies the legend background image drawing mode.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定图像的显示方式; 映像可以平铺、 缩放后，等等。The property determines how the image is displayed; the image can be tiled, scaled, and so forth. 如果缩放图像，它将拉伸以适合将图例的边界。If an image is scaled, it will be stretched to fit within the bounds of the legend. 如果平铺图像，则从图例的左上角开始，对其重复绘制。If the image is tiled, it is repeatedly drawn, starting from the top-left corner of the legend. 有关可用包装模式的详细信息，请参阅枚举主题。For more information about the available wrapping modes, see the enumeration topic. 如果属性设置为，绘制图像的位置由属性设置。If the property is set to , the location where the image is drawn is determined by the property setting.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Color BackSecondaryColor { System::Drawing::Color get(); void set(System::Drawing::Color value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Windows.Forms.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartColorEditor, System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 获取或设置图例背景的辅助颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the secondary color of a legend background.

value.span: 一个 值，该值用于带阴影或渐变填充的背景的辅助颜色。

span.span: A value used for the secondary color of background with hatching or gradient fill.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定辅助背景色的许多对象，并在应用渐变颜色时使用。The property determines the secondary background color of many objects, and is used when gradient colors are being applied. 你可以设置为任何有效的 ARGB alpha、 红色、 绿色 (蓝色） 值。You can set to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. 如果使用阴影，则属性确定图例阴影线的颜色。If hatching is used, the property determines the color of the hatching lines for the legend. 若要使用的图例背景渐变颜色：To use gradient colors for the background of a legend: - 设置与主要颜色属性。Set the primary color with the property. - 设置使用的辅助颜色属性。Set the secondary color with the property. - 设置为所需的渐变样式的属性。Set the property to the desired gradient style.

span.span: Gets or sets the border color of a legend.

value.span: 一个 值，用于绘制图例的边框颜色。

span.span: A value used to draw the border color of a legend.

value.span: 默认颜色为 。

span.span: The default color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以将此属性设置为任何有效的 ARGB alpha、 红色、 绿色 (蓝色） 值。You can set this property to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartDashStyle BorderDashStyle { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartDashStyle get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartDashStyle value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置图例的边框样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the border style of a legend.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，该值确定图表元素的边框样式。

span.span: A enumeration value that determines the border style of the chart element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定要用于边框的线条样式。The property determines the line style to use for a border. 行可以是实体、 线和等。The line can be solid, dotted, and so forth. 有关其他边框样式，请参阅枚举主题。For other border styles, see the enumeration topic.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int BorderWidth { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置图例的边框宽度。

span.span: Gets or sets the border width of a legend.

value.span: 一个 值，该值确定图例边框的宽度（以像素为单位）。

span.span: An value that determines the border width, in pixels, of the legend.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意，属性还可以在作为折线图中，自定义图例项显示为"线条"样式和等此类元素中设置行的宽度。Note that property can also set the width of lines in such elements as line charts, custom legend items displayed with a "line" style, and so forth.

span.span: Gets the object that contains the collection of cell columns for a legend.

value.span: 一个包含图例单元列的集合的 对象。

span.span: A object that contains the collection of cell columns for a legend.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CustomItems As LegendItemsCollection

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Windows.Forms.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemCollectionEditor, System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 获取用于自定义图例项的 对象。

span.span: Gets a object used for custom legend items.

value.span: 对象。

span.span: A object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此集合属性可用来添加、 删除或修改自定义图例项。This collection property can be used to add, delete or modify custom legend items. 自定义图例项，与默认图例项不同没有关联的序列或数据点。Custom legend items, unlike default legend items, do not have associated series or data points. 若要修改的图例项，使用事件。To modify legend items, use the event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::Docking Docking { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::Docking get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::Docking value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个确定图例是否是停靠图例的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether the legend is docked.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，该值可确定图例是否处于停靠状态。

span.span: A enumeration value that determines whether the legend is docked.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以停靠到顶部、 左侧、 底部或右侧的整个图表图像或内部或外部的图表区。The can be docked to the top, left, bottom or right of either the entire chart image, or the inside or outside of a chart area. 如果属性设置为`false`，停靠适用于整个图表图像。If the property is set to `false`, docking applies to the entire chart image. 如果属性设置为`true`，停靠适用于指定对象属性If the property is set to `true`, docking applies to the object specified by the property 此属性如果不起作用属性未设置为。This property has no effect if the property is not set to .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Enabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

value.span: 如果启用该图例，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the legend is enabled; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要隐藏图例，请将此属性设置为`false`。To hide a legend, set this property to `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Font ^ Font { System::Drawing::Font ^ get(); void set(System::Drawing::Font ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置用于设置图例字体属性的 对象。

span.span: Gets or sets a object, which is used to set font properties of the legend.

value.span: 一个 对象，用于设置图例的字体属性。

span.span: A object which is used to set font properties of the legend.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你尝试更改此属性对象在运行时，将产生编译错误。If you attempt to change the properties of this object at run time, a compilation error will occur. 若要在运行时设置字体属性，你必须创建一个新对象。To set font properties at run time, you must create a new object. > [!NOTE] > 如果设置 Legend.Font.Size 属性中，属性将设置为 false。If you set the Legend.Font.Size property, the property will be set to false. 此外，如果你设置属性为 true，此属性将重置为其默认值，该值是 8 个点。Also, if you set the property to true, this property will be reset to its default, which is 8 points.

value.span: 使用交错背景色绘制图例行，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if legend rows will be drawn with interlaced background color; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果图例中包含许多项，属性可以用于提高可读性。When the legend contains many entries, the property can be used to improve readability. 当此属性设置为`true`，图例将显示交错，可使用设置的行的背景色属性。When this property is set to `true`, the legend will display a background color for the rows that are interlaced, which can be set using the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性是仅当使用交替的行时才适用。This property is only applicable if interlaced rows are used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性仅会造成影响，如果属性设置为的名称对象。This property will only have an effect if the property is set to the name of a object. > [!NOTE] > 如果属性设置为任何值、属性有任何影响。If the property is set to any value other than , the property also has no effect. 这是因为将图例的位置由属性设置。This is because the position of the legend is determined by the property setting.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示表列间距。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 图例文本字体的百分比计算属性值。The property value is calculated as a percentage of the legend text font.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::LegendItemOrder LegendItemOrder { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::LegendItemOrder get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::LegendItemOrder value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置用于指定图例项显示的顺序。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the order in which legend items are displayed.

summary.span: 此属性仅对自动添加到图表序列中的图例项有效；对自定义图例项无效。

span.span: This property only affects legend items automatically added for the chart series; it has no effect on custom legend items.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，用于指定图例项显示顺序。

span.span: A enumeration value that specifies the order in which legend items are displayed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性设置为，如果使用 StackedColumn、 StackedColumn100、 StackedArea 或 StackedArea100 图表类型，则将自动反转图例。If the property is set to , the legend will automatically be reversed if StackedColumn, StackedColumn100, StackedArea or StackedArea100 chart types are used.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::LegendStyle LegendStyle { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::LegendStyle get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::LegendStyle value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置图例样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the style of the legend.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，该值可确定图例样式。

span.span: A enumeration value that determines the legend style.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，图例显示为一系列的表中的项。By default, the legend is displayed as a series of items in a table. 你可以指定是否通过设置宽度还是高度展开表中的项属性。You can specify whether to expand items in the table width-wise or height-wise by setting the property. 当属性设置为、控件将确定是否绘制宽表或高的表，具体取决于的对齐方式和定位的图表。When the property is set to , the control will determine whether to draw a wide table or a tall table, depending on the alignment and positioning of the chart. 这可能导致图例要绘制使用多个图例项列。This may cause the legend to be drawn using multiple legend item columns. 有三个可能图例样式： 列、 行和表。There are three possible styles for a legend: Column, Row and Table. 请参阅下表中的这些样式的摘要：Refer to the table below for a summary of these styles: |样式Style|描述Description| |-|-| |列Column|图例项显示在带有多个行的一个列。Legend items are displayed in one column, with multiple rows. 最常用情况是左侧或右侧的图表图例停靠。Most commonly used when the legend is docked to the left or right of the chart.| |行Row|图例项显示在一个行中，包含多个列。Legend items are displayed in one row, with multiple columns. 最常用于图例停靠到顶部或底部图表时。Most commonly used when the legend is docked to the top or bottom of the chart.| |表Table|图例项将显示使用多个列和行。Legend items are displayed using multiple columns and rows.|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property float MaximumAutoSize { float get(); void set(float value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置图例的最大大小（以图表区域的百分比形式表示）。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum size of the legend, measured as a percentage of the chart area.

summary.span: 此值由自动布局算法使用。

span.span: This value is used by the automatic layout algorithm.

value.span: A值，该值表示图例的最大大小。

span.span: A value that represents the maximum size of the legend.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果图例停靠到左侧或右侧的图表区中，此属性确定图例，以图表区的百分比的最大宽度。If the legend is docked to the left or right of the chart area, this property determines the maximum width of the legend, which is measured as a percentage of the chart area. 如果在图例停靠到顶部或底部，此属性确定图例，还以百分比度量的最大高度。If the legend is docked to the top or bottom, this property determines the maximum height of the legend, which is also measured as a percentage.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::ElementPosition ^ Position { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::ElementPosition ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::ElementPosition ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置可用于获取或设置图例位置的 对象。

span.span: Gets or sets an object, which can be used to get or set the position of the legend.

value.span: 如果 属性自动设置（即 Legend.Position.Auto = ）由 控件计算的图例位置，则考虑 、 和 属性设置。

span.span: If the property is automatic (that is, Legend.Position.Auto = ) the legend position is calculated automatically by the control, taking into account the , and property settings.

value.span: 如果不自动设置，则将忽略 、 和 属性，图例位置仅由返回的 对象的值确定。

span.span: If it is not automatic, the , and properties are ignored, and the legend position is solely determined by the value of the returned object.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Windows.Forms.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartColorEditor, System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 获取或设置图例的阴影颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the shadow color of the legend.

value.span: 一个 值，该值指示图例的阴影颜色。

span.span: A value that specifies the shadow color of the legend.

value.span: 默认颜色为 。

span.span: The default color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可以设置为任何有效的 ARGB alpha、 红色、 绿色 (蓝色） 值。This property can be set to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. Alpha 值可以用于实现"真实"隐藏作用;请尝试"128,0,0,0"阴影的颜色值。The alpha value can be used to achieve a "realistic" shadowing effect; try a color value of "128,0,0,0" for shadows. 若要实现阴影，设置为零 (0) 以外的值的属性。To implement a shadow, set the property to a value other than zero (0).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int ShadowOffset { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置图例的阴影偏移量（以像素为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the shadow offset, in pixels, of the legend.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示图例的阴影偏移量（以像素为单位）。

span.span: An value that represents the shadow offset, in pixels, of the legend.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要实现隐藏，请将此属性设置为零 (0) 以外的值。To implement shadowing, set this property to a value other than zero (0). 正值将导致向下和向右; 移动阴影负值将导致阴影向上和向左移动。A positive value will result in a shadow that shifts down and to the right; a negative value will result in a shadow that shifts up and to the left.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::LegendTableStyle TableStyle { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::LegendTableStyle get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::LegendTableStyle value); };

span.span: A enumeration value that specifies the legend table style.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性才适用如果属性设置为。This property is only applicable if the property is set to .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int TextWrapThreshold { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置可在文本换行前在图例中连续显示的字符数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of characters that can be sequentially displayed in the legend before the text is wrapped.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示在文本换行前可在图例中连续显示的字符数。

span.span: An value that represents the number of characters that can be placed in the legend sequentially before the text is wrapped.

value.span: 默认值为 25。

span.span: The default value is 25.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 图例文本超出指定此属性的值，当遇到下一个空格字符时，将自动包装文本。When the legend text exceeds the value specified by this property, text will be automatically wrapped when the next whitespace character is encountered. 如果在文本中不有任何空白字符，则不会包装文本。Text will not be wrapped if there are no whitespace characters in the text. 设置为零，以禁用该功能的属性。Set the property to zero to disable the feature.
